result.arabic_text: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَفِرۡعَوۡنُ ذُو ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ
result.translation: 12. Waxaa beeniyey (Rususha) iyaga hortood qoladii Nuux, Caad iyo Fircoon ee lahaa boqortooyo xoog leh6.
result.footnotes: 6. Dhismooyin dhaadheer iyo ciidammo tiro badan iyo tiirar uu dadka geeyo ciqaab ahaan.
